md:
giải nghĩa từ "four" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan

* four (number) : bốn
	+ Meaning: a number that is one more than three
	+ Example sentence: "I have four books on my shelf."
	+ Related words: three, five, six, seven, eight, nine, ten

* four (time) : bốn giờ
	+ Meaning: four o'clock
	+ Example sentence: "I'll meet you at four at the park."
	+ Related words: three o'clock, five o'clock, six o'clock, seven o'clock, eight o'clock, nine o'clock, ten o'clock

Note: Depending on the context, "four" can have different meanings and translations. The above explanations are just some of the common meanings and translations of "four".
html:

    • Meaning: four o'clock
    • Example sentence: "I'll meet you at four at the park."
    • Related words: three o'clock, five o'clock, six o'clock, seven o'clock, eight o'clock, nine o'clock, ten o'clock
